mapper.select: SELECT su.nick_name, su.user_name, mc.class_name, ms.birthday, ms.grade, ms.school, ms.major, ms.direction, ms.graduation, ms.worked, ms.remark FROM ms_student AS ms LEFT JOIN sys_user AS su ON ms.user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ms_student_class msc ON ms.user_id = msc.user_id LEFT JOIN ms_class mc on ms.class_id = mc.class_id

SELECT su.nick_name, su.user_name, mc.class_name, ms.birthday, ms.grade, ms.school, ms.major, ms.direction, ms.graduation, ms.worked, ms.remark FROM ms_student AS ms LEFT JOIN sys_user AS su ON ms.user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ms_student_class msc ON ms.user_id = msc.user_id LEFT JOIN ms_class mc on ms.class_id = mc.class_id WHERE nick_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nickName}, '%') AND user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%') AND grade LIKE CONCAT('%', #{grade}, '%') AND school LIKE CONCAT('%', #{school}, '%') AND major LIKE CONCAT('%', #{major}, '%') AND direction LIKE CONCAT('%', #{direction}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ms_student(user_id, class_id, birthday, grade, school, major, direction, graduation, worked, prov, city, home_address, current_address, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) VALUES (#{userId}, #{clazzId}, #{birthday}, #{grade}, #{school}, #{major}, #{direction}, #{graduation}, #{worked}, #{prov}, #{city}, #{homeAddress}, #{currentAddress}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{remark})

INSERT INTO sys_user(user_id, dept_id, user_name, nick_name, user_type, email, phonenumber, sex, avatar, password, status, del_flag, login_ip, login_date, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) VALUES (#{userId}, #{deptId}, #{userName}, #{nickName}, #{userType}, #{email}, #{phonenumber}, #{sex}, #{avatar}, #{password}, #{status}, #{delFlag}, #{loginIp}, #{loginDate}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{remark})
INSERT INTO ms_student_class(user_id, class_id, status, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{clazzId}, #{status}, #{createTime})
